overview: Patrick is a wealthy man that finds himself wondering if his fianc√© is with him for who he is or for his money. But, when his father puts a hold on his funds, he will learn the truth whether he wants to or not. Sean, Patrick's older brother, is known for being a playboy. But, when he falls in love with a woman that has an 8 years old girl named Ashley, his life takes a  new  turn.
title: For Money or Love
